message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm looking for $150 for it.
Hey Alice, $150 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $105. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm afraid $105 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $135. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $115. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer you the product for $130. Let me know if that's more acceptable to you.
